This component gives you the ability to view and play an existing youTube video.

|| Component Attribute   || Required || Description || Default value ||
|| videoID || true || The video ID to be displayed. || NA ||
|| width || false || The width of the player. || 425 ||
|| height || false || The height of the player. || 344 ||
|| bgcolor || false || The background color of the player. || #cccccc ||
